categories: Category:Military personnel of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Sarria Jevad was a female Human who was stationed at the command center in Drift Hills Imperial Outpost on Hoth. An Imperial Scout Captain, she and the scout Davi were concerned with the Republic trying to turn a downed starfighter into a powerful offensive snowspeeder. When Davi did not reply to a comm check in time, Sarria recruited an Imperial hero acting in the name of the Bane Brigade to complete the mission and blow up the remains of the starfighter.
